runs.comm: Dilshan into the act, short and wide and it's cut hard but Dilshan throws himself to his right at point and saves a certain four
He used that pull shot to good effect against India and he's repeated it here, but there is a deep square leg in place, just a single this time
short on middle, knocked down into the leg side and steals a quick single
a slower one this time, pushed it fuller just outside off, dragged towards midwicket

bowled'im! Played it on, lands on a good length just outside off stump and there is a hint of inward movement, Watson got forward, tried to defend it into the off side, got an inside edge to rattle the stumps
short of a good length on the off, pushed off the back foot to point
slides it down the leg side to begin with, Warner fails to make contact, called a wide
full on middle, it's flicked uppishly through the vacant midwicket region into the deep for a single
short, teasing the right hander there, got it to move away after pitching, Haddin was tempted to cut but went loosely at it and missed
the cardinal error in a limited-overs game, a front foot no-ball, charges down the track and slaps it past a diving mid-on
gets the treatment, just what Haddin wanted, Welegedera doles out a length ball on the off stump, Haddin gets his left foot out of the way and clears mid-off
follows that up with a meaty delivery on the legs, flicks it away over mid-on for another four, easily done, effortless
drives that on the up, bowls it on a good length outside off, cracked straight to extra cover
shortish on middle, jabs it into the leg side through midwicket for a single
short and wide and gets the treatment, the third man is up and Haddin finds the gap between him and point, a delightful cut
pushed off the front foot to extra cover

that was unneccessary, change of pace this time, a slower one bowled on a length on the off stump, Haddin was targeting the deep midwicket boundary, was early into the shot, ended up getting a leading edge and the ball landed safely into the palms of the only MP playing international cricket
slides it on the pads, Warner tries to tickle it fine, it clips the pads on the way to the keeper
appeal for lbw, appeared to pitch a hint outside leg stump, it did, nipped back in to rap him on the pads as he tried to whip it square
short of a good length outside leg stump, tries to nudge it fine, is struck on the thigh pad
the third man is up, Welegedera pushed it on a good length, Warner tried to smack him through the line, got a thick outside edge past the keeper and short third man for a streaky boundary
and again, the slower one this time, tries to repeat the shot does Warner, gets a thick edge and it lands just behind Jayasuriya at short third
drifting on the pads and Warner misses out while trying to drive it through midwicket, is hit on the pads and he sneaks a leg bye
short of a good length on the off, nips away, guides it past the keeper but there is a widish slip in place
slower one bowled short outside off, runs it past Dilshan and races through for a single
slower one bowled full on the off, crunched to mid-off for a single to keep strike
loops it in towards middle and leg from round the wicket, defended cautiously back to the bowler
flatter on middle, comes down the track and pushes it to extra cover

brilliantly taken! Excellent reflexes from Jayawardene at slip, it's tossed up a hint this time and Warner's eyes lit up, tried to blaze it through the off side, the ball turned away to take the outside edge and Jayawardene, among the best slip fielders in the game, reacted superbly to snap it moving to his right

another one goes! Randiv's on a hat-trick. Failed to pick the straighter one, flighted outside off stump, Hussey turned the face to play it through midwicket, stepped out of the crease, missed and Sangakkara did the rest
negotiates it well, short of a good length, some extra bounce as it turns in, gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the off side
gets a stride forward this time, defends it into the leg side for a single
defended off the back foot towards cover
short of a good length outside off, dabs it past point into the deep for a single
shortish on the off, gets forward and defends it to extra cover
slower offcutter, Clarke gets forward and plays it back with a straight bat
fuller, on a driving length outside off, pushed firmly to extra cover
short of a good length outside off, run down to third man for a single
flighted on the off stump, driven towards long-on for a single
had eyed his spot, slightly short, White walked well across, bent low and swept it hard behind square for welcome boundary for Australia
turning in from outside off, nudged in front of square leg for a single
went on straight, the right amount of bounce for Clarke to make a bit of room and dab it wide of short third man for three runs
played inside the line to that one, tried to push it straight, got an outside edge in front of point for another single
short on the off, waits for it to turn in and punches it towards deep cover for one more
lands on a good length on the off, no spin on sight, defended towards point
the legspinner, didn't turn much, pushed firmly to short extra cover
the offspinner there, turned in sharply to strike him on the pads
pitched up and White senses an opportunity, swings it hard over wide long-on and clears the ropes comfortably
leans forward and punches it towards long-off for a single
a long hop and Clarke will be disappointed he didn't smash that away, mistimes a pull wide of deep square leg but still gets a couple
driven firmly to extra cover
on the pads, White defends awkwardly after leaning across

is that a missed stumping? down the leg side, White was down the track when he misses the ball, Sangakkara can't collect and it rolls to short fine leg, perhaps there was a deflection off the pads as it wasn't called a wide
poked towards point for a quick single
rocks back to make room, and takes toll of the short ball served up, crunches it powerfully past point for four
fullish and pitching just outside off, driven towards mid-on
shorter this time and wider, prodded towards cover for a single
gets well forward and defends to the off side
bat and pad close together as he blocks cautiously again
driven along the ground towards long-off for a single
pre-meditated paddle towards short fine from outside off by White
length ball on legstump, tucked towards midwicket
again on the pads, this time it is nudged to square leg for a single
angling towards off this time, played towards mid-off

Dropped by Mendis, should have been taken though it was a bit tough, White top-edges a sweep which lobs to the left of Mendis, who can't hang on after making good ground, the bowler lets him have an earful
used his feet, defended to covers

Randiv's super day continues, Clarke makes room to cut, he misses and the off bail is on the floor, there's some confusion whether the ball hit stumps or whether it was the keeper's gloves that dislodged the bail, replays show the ball hit the top of offstump, and Clarke has to go
starts with a slow bouncer, swung towards deep square leg where Jayasuriya races across to field
streaky four, short of length and outside off, comes in a touch after pitching, gets the outside edge past the keeper and too fine for short third
much fuller, driven down to long-off for a comfortable single
length ball heading for off, gets forward and pushes towards extra cover
length ball and just outside off, driven down to long-off this time
length ball outside off, gets on the front foot and pushes it towards extra cover
defended towards short midwicket, a sharp single is taken, a direct hit from Chandimal would have sent back White
short of length, Hussey looks to swing to the leg side, he misses and the ball sails to the keeper
pitched up and outside off, punched towards short cover
length ball outside off, Hussey is content to leave it to the keeper
another dot ball, length delivery on off, turned towards mid-on but straight at the fielder
gets the single this time, driving down to long-off and ambles through
short of length and outside off, gets an outside edge, the ball is in the air for a touch as it goes towards third man
low full toss on offstump, bunted down to long-off for a single
short of length and angling just outside off, nicely steered towards third man off the back foot
slugs that slow bouncer from well outside off to wide long-on, pure power from White
length ball heading for off, muscled back down the track, hits the bowler's ankle as he is in his follow-through and then rolls towards cover

a slow delivery from Mathews, Hussey carves it towards backward point, where Dilshan collects and fires it to the bowler's end, Mathews breaks the stumps but Hussey's full-length dive makes sure he's safe, third umpire is called to make the decision though, one replay is enough to confirm Hussey's not out
length ball sliding down leg, turned to short fine
misses out on the full toss on legstump, could have whacked it where he wanted, but only manages to get it to deep backward square
shortish ball outside off, White makes room to free his arms, swings at the ball but gets a thick edge which takes the ball over backward point for four
this is a beautiful hit, again makes room and carves it inside-out over deep extra cover for six, lovely
blocked back to the bowler this time
shuffles towards the offstump and clips the ball in front of square leg to et the single which brings up a fifty he can be proud of
full and down the leg side, White gets a fine tickle on it, Sangakkara dives and manages to get a hand on it but can't take off enough pace to stop it from going for four
Malinga shows us his yorker-on-demand ability, squeezed out towards point
yorker on offstump, dug out in front of point for a single
guess what? another yorker, on middle this time, blocked back to the bowler
nope, sticks to the pinpoint yorker routine, on offstump, defended down the pitch
shortish this time for variety, on offstump, White pushes it towards extra cover and takes the single to keep strike
Welegedara picks up the yorkers thread from Malinga, he starts with one heading for middle stump, prodded towards cover
full and wide, Hussey mistimes a punch to cover
a low full toss on legstump, eased down to long-on for a single
low full toss just outside off, super stuff from Welegedara, Hussey whips it in front of square leg for a single
not so super this time as his full toss on middle stump isn't low enough, White gets under it and absolutely powers it to the sightscreen, brutal from White

undoes all the good work at the start of the over with another hit-me ball, on legstump this time, White gets his front leg out of the way and dismisses it over wide long-on, did I mention White's a powerful batsmen?
now a delicate touch to get runs, a knee-high full toss outside off, Hussey spots that fine leg is up, he paddles it over the man for four
more finesse from Hussey , provided a bit of room and the batsman carves it wide of deep backward point, where the fielder has to dive to stop another boundary

Australia show their resilience yet again, shortish ball, Hussey charges down the track and crunches the ball over cover and beat sweeper cover at the rope for four more, ten off the first three balls
full and wide, a bit of an outside edge sends the ball fizzing to third man
not quite a yorker from Malinga, very full on middle, driven back to the bowler

lovely shot by Hussey, full delivery just outside off, Hussey paddles it nonchalantly to the fine leg boundary, not an easy stroke to play against a bowler of Malinga's pace, but you wouldn't think that seeing Hussey play it
six more, Australia on the rampage here, a bit of flight from Mendis, full and outside off. more power-hitting from White, this time over long-off, flat hit for six
he comes into play first up when White drives firmly down the ground
free-hit coming up as Mendis oversteps by a big way, punched to extra cover
White powers the ball straight down the ground, Dilshan runs across to cut it off
no one's cutting this one off, white dances down the track and clubs over long-off for six, nearly took out the cameraman there
between Dilshan and extra cover for a single this time
Hussey reverse-sweep a ball from offstump to Jayasuriya at short third for a single
it's raining sixes here, a not-so-low full toss just outside off, Hussey smacks it straight for six
oh dear, Sri Lanka have really lost the plot towards the end of the innings, Hussey makes room and swings the ball over mid-on for four this time
a full toss well outside off, cracked towards sweeper cover for two more
full and just outside off, along the ground to extra cover
good delivery, a yorker on legstump, White backs away and pushes it towards mid-on to bring up the century stand
swung to long-on for a single, Australia finish on 168 for 5, what a comeback by Australia, similar to what they did against Bangaldesh
